jobDescription: Company Overview  Nippon Seiki is a world-class manufacturer of instruments for vehicles, agricultural, and construction equipment. Established in 1945, Nippon Seiki Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Japan, with numerous facilities worldwide. N.S. International, Ltd. ("NSI"), a group company of Nippon Seiki, located in Troy, MI, is a tier one supplier of instrument clusters and head-up display units for FCA US, General Motors, BMW, Honda, Harley Davidson, Suzuki, Polaris, Arctic Cat and other OEM's.  Purpose of Job  The Data Center Analyst serves as a technical expert on architecture, design, implementation and support advanced technology solutions from Cisco, Dell, Lenovo, NetApp, EMC, Microsoft, VMware, and other vendors, in a variety of large and complex computing environments. This position serves as a staff specialist on multiple operating systems and platforms supporting enterprise-wide or large-scale computing. Responsible for troubleshooting all aspects of the data center equipment as reported by Nippon Seikis North American group companies (NSNA) users. The Data Center Analyst applies significant professional experience and training in information technology to the most complex assignments requiring sizing and optimization, systems monitoring and modification of systems, performance analysis, maintenance and management of networking, storage, backup, and appliances, and security administration.
